reasoning: Autoimmune arthritis is an umbrella term encompassing rheumatoid arthritis (RA ~0.5-1% prevalence), juvenile idiopathic arthritis (JIA ~0.1%), and other autoimmune arthritides. Aggregate prevalence estimate ~8.5% (8,500 per 100k). Metric: prevalence appropriate for chronic disease. Low confidence reflects aggregate nature and lack of unified epidemiological estimates for the umbrella category.
